snippet.title: Near Fantasy Space [ニアファンタジースペース] Game Sample - PC/Doujin
snippet.description:
This is an awesome game that plays like a certain classic shooter of yore...*cough* Fantasy Zone *cough*. The circle behind this game is known as YGC, or Your Game Creaters. From what few games they've made, they seem to be fans of Sega games.

If you've played Fantasy Zone, then this game shouldn't be anything new to you, but the game has slick upgraded visuals, a good soundtrack, and cool power-ups, not to mention a few interesting references. For example, does this first level seem unusual to you? It is a homage to Ikaruga; the enemies fire bullets of black and white energy and the music is a sort of Fantasy Zone rendition of Ikaruga's first level. 

Additionally, the boss can only be killed with it's own firepower; you fight a white and black dolphin and the black dolphin must be hit with white bullets and the white bullets must hit the black dolphin. Both dolphins must be damaged to an extent; if you only hit one dolphin, the boss can't be defeated and vice versa. You have to hit them both.

You can find this game at:

http://home.dlsite.com/work/=/product_id/RJ057757.html

NOTE: The game has a patch that can be found at YGC's site below:

http://ygchp.hp.infoseek.co.jp/

The patch makes the game version 1.10, which adds a stage 4.5 to the game.
